elements.name: Attempt to contact a mechanic without proper authentication

doc_string.value:
07:22:47.119 request:
1 > POST http://192.168.1.112:8888/workshop/api/merchant/contact_mechanic
1 > Content-Type: application/json; charset=UTF-8
1 > Content-Length: 78
1 > Host: 192.168.1.112:8888
1 > Connection: Keep-Alive
1 > User-Agent: Apache-HttpClient/4.5.14 (Java/17.0.2)
1 > Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflate
{"name":"'John Doe'","email":"'johndoe@example.com'","phone":"'555-555-1234'"}

1 < 401
1 < Server: openresty/1.25.3.1
1 < Date: Wed, 13 Nov 2024 07:22:47 GMT
1 < Content-Type: application/json
1 < Transfer-Encoding: chunked
1 < Connection: keep-alive
1 < Allow: POST, OPTIONS
1 < Vary: origin, Cookie
1 < X-Frame-Options: DENY
1 < X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
1 < Referrer-Policy: same-origin
1 < Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin
{"message":"JWT Token required!"}

result.error_message:
match failed: CONTAINS
  $ | data types don't match (MAP:STRING)
  {"message":"JWT Token required!"}
  'Unauthorized'
